{include "default_salutation"} –

Thank you so much for joining us for Knocking at the Door of Democracy: 100 years after women's suffrage. Watch the full recording of the event on our YouTube channel.

We heard from a dynamic line up of fierce women who are helping to shape politics in Georgia: Professor Pearl K. Dowe, Melita Easters, Mary-Pat Hector, Liliana Bakhtiari, and Maria del Rosario Palacios. Together, we shared our vision for realizing the full vision of suffrage.

Election Day is in 75 days. From the top ticket all the way down, the outcome of the election will have tremendous consequences for women across the country and the state. So, let's continue to roll up our sleeves as voters, candidates, and organizers.

Here are a few actions items we invite you to take:

  • Check out our NEW reproductive rights scorecard and share it widely. We scored all current state legislators on eight core bills since 2012.
  • Post a short video on why YOU Are voting on powerstory.io. Don't forget to tag it with #ThisWomanVotes.
  • Become a poll worker! Sign up on everyaction.com.

Thank you all for your unwavering commitment to women's rights.

In solidarity,

Executive Director, ACLU of {affiliate_name}
